snippet: The announcement by the departing defense secretary, Leon E. Panetta, of the Distinguished Warfare Medal recognized the changing nature of warfare.
abstract: Departing Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta announces new Distinguished Warfare Medal to honor drone pilots and computer defense experts; move is likely to draw criticism.
lead_paragraph: The announcement by the departing defense secretary, Leon E. Panetta, of the Distinguished Warfare Medal recognized the changing nature of warfare.

headline.seo: New Medal to Honor Drone Pilots and Computer Experts
